source("../../R/functions.R")
alumni <- read_mdtable(mdfile = "../../static/database/alumni.md", skip = 0)
alumni$Supervisor <- convert_id2link(staff_id = alumni$Supervisor, language = "zh")
alumni <- alumni[, c("Name_zh", "Position_zh", "Enter", "Leave", "Supervisor", "Currently_zh")]

DT::datatable(alumni, escape = FALSE, 
              colnames = c("姓名", "身份", "加入时间", "离开时间", "导师", "目前状况"),
              options = list(lengthMenu = c(nrow(alumni), 5, 10)))
